scripts.build: npm run builden && npm run buildzh && hexo swpp && gulp
scripts.builden: sh ./deploy-en.sh && npm run clean && hexo generate && hexo bangumi -u && cp "./source-en/serviceworker.js" "./public-en/sw.js"
scripts.buildzh: sh ./deploy-zh.sh && npm run clean && hexo generate && hexo bangumi -u && cp "./source/serviceworker.js" "./public/sw.js"
scripts.deployzh: npm run buildzh && gulp && hexo deploy
scripts.deployen: npm run builden && gulp && hexo deploy
scripts.serveren: npm run clean && sh ./deploy-en.sh && hexo s -g
scripts.serverzh: npm run clean && sh ./deploy-zh.sh && hexo s -g
